code: import React from"react";import{Container,Card}from"react-bootstrap";import{Pie}from"react-chartjs-2";import{Chart as ChartJS,ArcElement,Tooltip,Legend}from"chart.js";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";ChartJS.register(ArcElement,Tooltip,Legend);export default function Dashboard(_ref){let{achievements}=_ref;const categoryCounts=achievements.reduce((acc,a)=>{const cat=a.category||"Uncategorized";acc[cat]=(acc[cat]||0)+1;return acc;},{});const total=achievements.length;const chartData={labels:Object.keys(categoryCounts),datasets:[{data:Object.values(categoryCounts),backgroundColor:["#007bff","#28a745","#ffc107","#dc3545","#6f42c1"],borderColor:"#fff",borderWidth:2}]};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Container,{style:{marginTop:"30px"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-center mb-4",children:"\uD83D\uDCC8 Achievement Dashboard"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"d-flex justify-content-around flex-wrap mb-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card,{className:"p-3 shadow-sm text-center",style:{width:"200px"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h5",{children:"Total Achievements"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:total})]}),Object.keys(categoryCounts).map((cat,i)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card,{className:"p-3 shadow-sm text-center",style:{width:"200px"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h6",{children:cat}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:categoryCounts[cat]})]},i))]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{width:"400px",margin:"0 auto"},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Pie,{data:chartData})})]});}
